The pilgrim. The second part Written by P. Belon, gent. Translator of the first part, and dedicated to the dutchess of Albemarle. Pelerin. English Brémond, Gabriel de. Belon, P. (Peter) Albemarle, Elizabeth Monck, Duchess of, 1654-1734.
[12], 252 p.
printed for R. Bentley and M. Magnes, in Russel-street in Covent-Garden, London : 1681.
A translation, by Peter Belon, of Gabriel de Bremond's: Le pelerin. Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
=======

[12], 252 p.
printed for R. Bentley and M. Magnes, in Russel-street in Covent-Garden, London : 1681.
A translation, by Peter Belon, of Gabriel de Bremond's: Le pelerin. Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.

R. Bentley
Russel-street in Covent-Garden
